resources.string: Europe is a continent entorely is the Northern Hemishphere and mostl in the Rastern Hemmisphere.It is bordered by the Artic Ocean to the west and the Medirerranean Sea to the south.Since around 1950, Europe is mist commoly consideres to be separated from Asia by the wathershed
